CustomField.formula: IF(Call_List__r.RecordType.Name=='Collection AMFS' && TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) != 'Redemption TM',Total_Approved__c+ Total_Not_Approved__c,IF(Call_List__r.RecordType.Name=='Collection AMFS' && TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Redemption TM' && (TEXT(Call_Status_Config__c)== 'Cancel' || TEXT(Call_Status_Config__c)== 'Inforced' || TEXT(Call_Status_Config__c)== 'Pending'),1,IF( ISPICKVAL(Activity_Result__c , 'Contacted'),1,0)))
CustomField.label: Total Contacted
